title: [VXN] Looking for a Logo Designer / Graphics Artist
body:
Hey, I'm looking to start an esports organisation by the name of Vixen Esports. I am currently in need of a Logo or a Logo Designer - willing to pay if met standards. Please contact me on game (Hoodlum), or email me at: tommy.van@hilarious.com, and I will tell you what is needed. 

If you are also looking for a Graphics Designer job online, Vixen Esports could use a designer.
Thank you :)
